key.name: selected-tariff-type
key.description: The type of tariff selected (AGILE, GO, or INTELLIGENT). Defaults to AGILE.

key.name: selected-tariff-code
key.description: The specific tariff code selected by the user for fetching electricity prices. If empty, the app will attempt to auto-detect a default.

key.name: selected-region-code
key.description: The region code (e.g., '_A', '_B') for the selected tariff. If empty, the app will attempt to auto-detect a default.

key.name: window-width
key.description: The width of the application window.

key.name: window-height
key.description: The height of the application window.

key.name: window-maximized
key.description: Whether the application window is maximized.
